title: Drawing, 1871
medium: Recto and verso: Graphite on gray paper.
signed:
Recto: Signed and dated in graphite, at lower right: T. M. /  ... / 1871.
Verso: signed and dated in graphite, at lower right corner: 1871 / ... / T. M.
inscribed:
Recto: Inscribed in graphite, at lower right: T.M.  The Devil's Den, Yellowstone / 1871; at lower left corner, in graphite: (10); and in pen and ink: No. 276.
Verso: Inscribed in graphite, at various locations: Gray lava full of holes, cave (twice);  at lower right corner: 1871 / Devil's Den  T M / Yellowstone
description:
Recto: Horizontal view of the gorge at Devil's Den, Yellowstone.
Verso, in opposite direrection: View of same gorge.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, 1871.
1871. Recto and verso: Graphite on gray paper.. Gift of Thomas Moran. 1917-17-10.
